title.rendered: April 2024 Client of the Month: Pro-Logist ltd

content.rendered:
This month we spoke to Silvia, Managing Director of Pro-Logist ltd!

Pro-Logist ltd | LinkedIn

Hey Silvia! Tell us about your business

Pro-Logist, a pioneering logistics company, has been making waves in the industry since its inception earlier this year. Founded and led by a team of accomplished female entrepreneurs, Pro-Logist has quickly established itself as a trusted partner for businesses seeking reliable, innovative, and customer-centric logistics solutions.

Specialising in the transportation of premium commodities, fragile items, high-end merchandise, and complex shipments, Pro-Logist offers unparalleled expertise and dedication to ensuring the safe and timely delivery of every consignment.

What drove you to start your business?

The necessity to be able to manage closely the relationship with colleagues and clients, choosing who to partner with and who to provide our services to without compromising on quality and our core values.

What particular challenges did you have to overcome in setting up your business, and since then?

Obtaining specialist licenses (like the IATA membership which allows us to ship directly with airlines), making sure we could start with small investment and turning over revenue from day one. Breaking into a market which is very old school and male driven.

Why did you choose The Accountancy Partnership?

Flexible, good pricing for our company size, always available and always with a positive attitude. I also felt like I didn’t have to spend any time on setting up payroll and pensions as this was all taken care of by you guys with minimal effort from my end, so that I could focus on growing the business.

Have we helped you overcome any challenges, and if so, how?

Time (so I could focus on pushing sales and growing the business) and knowing we were following all the guidelines and were aware of all taxations since some of us are physically resident abroad.

What do you have planned for your business in future?

Expanding our network and branch out to the United States in a couple of years, grow the business by offering niche selected services that can push forward new projects and products to market as well as offering always carbon footprint conscious shipping options.

 
Learn more about our online accounting services for businesses just like Silvia. Call 020 3355 4047 or get an instant online quote.
